# ccx Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "ccx" {
  client_id     = "replace_with_your_own_client_id"
  client_secret = "replace_with_your_own_client_secret"
  # base_url = "optionally_use_a_different_base_url"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `base_url` (String)
- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String)
- `timeout` (String)
